questions.question: What were the goals and objectives of this class? What did you learn?
What background (other classes, skills, or knowledge) did you find useful for this course? Were the official prerequisites appropriate for this course?
Describe the effectiveness of the instructor's teaching techniques and why they were effective or ineffective.
How did the instructor encourage participation and learning? Was s/he successful? How available was the instructor outside of class? Describe the quality of feedback.
How many exams, papers, labs, presentations, projects, other graded assignments, and reading did the course require you to complete?
Did you find the readings and assignments instructive? How could they be improved?
If someone were to shop this course, what other courses would you suggest?
What would you suggest to the instructor to improve this course?
Finally, what would you suggest to fellow students thinking about enrolling in this class?
